alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Northern Phillips; Northern Valley; Southwest Phillips (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 2:20PM MST until March 07 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MONDAY TO 5 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Central and Southeast Phillips, Central and Southern Valley, Northern Phillips, Southwest Phillips and Northern Valley Counties. * WHEN...From 11 AM Monday to 5 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could reduce visibility below 1 mile at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...These conditions can stress newborn livestock.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Northern Phillips; Northern Valley; Southwest Phillips
